author: legodad1
title: A great mid-sized set
review:
Great minifigures: Nice detailed prints on all three, and great getting mid-sized legs for America Chavez. Also the Cape of Levitation now has greater potential to be played with as a 'sentient character'.

Build experience: I was pleasantly surprised at how much fun I had building Gargantos, it uses some novel building techniques. It reminded me at times of building some of the more complex brick-heads. I like the look of the completed build, with Gargantos elevated on four of its tentacles.

Parts: A couple of parts that were new to me, including a useful new 2x1x1+2/3 SNOT brick, and a new 4x4 round transparent orange element.

Recommended!
